Summary: It was exactly as the person from Colorado described (the same night)
trends: There has been one other sighting in Thomasville
There were no other sightings in Thomasville on or around December 24th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI was leaving my daughter's house at about 10-10:30 PM. I looked at the full moon and there was a star like object in the 4 or 5 o'clock position from the moon. I have never noticed this before. It appeared very close to the moon. It seemed to be still & was slightly yellowish if I remember correctly. When I got home about 20 minutes later it was still there. I went in the house and kind of forgot about it until I read the report from the person in Colorado who saw what sounds like the same thing.
